content:
I am working on issue #6693. I want to ask few things first.
To add this new feature of subscribe stream on basis of user interest. Here is what I have thought.

  • Add this page after registration page ('account\register')
  • Provide option of "skip this for now"
  • I am not sure for url of this page. like it can be 'account\register\stream_subscribe' or 'account\stream_subscribe'
  • And then according to this name of url, I will add html file, view function in 'register.py' and requirements.

@Yashashvi Dave did you read the notes I posted on that issue? This is a large project that should be done in parts, in order. I'd recommend submitting a PR that just does parts (0/1/3) before starting to work on the UI at all.

Okay. I have read instructions. When I claimed this I have only one scenario in my mind which you explained in issue as example. But making it generics can be very big. I will again go through the whole issue and then give you updates.

As a heads up, this feels like the type of project to me that will require a lot of design decisions, and hence may often get stuck for a week or two. So if you do end up working on it, I would suggest also having another project going.
It's also not a bite-size project. @Yashashvi Dave you may want to find something smaller for your early contributions.
